_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Eight qualities of a mendicant worthy of: Restrained in the code of conduct
Having good friends, companions, and associates
Able to attain the four absorptions, recollect past lives, have clairvoyance, and realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life.
